review: it appears your hippos are not as famished as you claim mr 47

loved this elusive target as a fan of casino royale its spot on and perfectly done with references to the movie its so funny that you get to use le chiffres cb torture rope as a fiber wire i also love the appearance of a previous character we see pretty often wont spoil it but its hilarious i got a little itch down there would you mind james bond
mostly freelancer junk the pistol from this pack is one of the ones with garbage accuracy so youll probably never use it i like the fiber wire tho
